problem.markdown:
>>Environmental scientists refer to biodiversity on three levels or scales. These are:<< () Sub-species, genus, family () Community, niche, species () Animals, plants, bacteria () Evenness, richness, and size (x) Genetic, species, and ecosystem
[explanation]
The three scales of biodiversity are genetic, species, and ecosystem.
[explanation]
